CustomField.description: This field is only applicable to Subprojects and Series LLCs. This is a URL field in the Project Control Center also (as opposed to a file upload).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: URL at which the project's Charter is publicly available. For example, this may be a link to a public PDF, a GitHub URL, or wiki URL where the Charter is publicly maintained by the project community.
CustomField.label: Charter URL
